sethMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
sethMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

sethMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
sethMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
sethMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

sethMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
sethMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

sethMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
sethMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !sethMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

sethMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
sethMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !sethMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
